text: Luminar Technologies | Palo Alto, CA & Orlando, FL | https://www.luminartech.com/ Our advanced LiDAR efforts just came out of stealth and we are hiring across the board for hardware (Opto, EE, FPGA, MechE, etc), software (CV/ML, robotics, simulation, core sw, data eng), vehicle integration, and manufacturing. Technically challenging and impactful work. Apply here: https://www.luminartech.com/careers/index.html
